hello.text: Hello doctor Yagokoro. I don't feel so good.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: Drained out. I have a big headache since this morning as well.

how.name: Did you drink anything weird ?
how.text: No, I didn't drink anything weird. Quite the opposite actually.

what.name: What happened to you ?
what.text: I have been swimming in the part of the lake near the geysers. The water is surprisingly salty there.

what.name: Something else I should be aware of ?
what.text: Well, and now I have been waiting in the queue for ages...

painkillers.name: Give her painkillers.
painkillers.text: That should really help with my headache, thanks !

water.name: Give her some water.
water.text: Ah, thanks, this is revitalizing. More please !

water.name: Make her take a bath
water.text: I really needed this, thanks. Must have really been dehydrated.
